scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:web && npm run build:bundler
scripts.note: wasm-pack uses release profile by default
scripts.build:bundler: npx cross-env RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir dist/bundler --${PROFILE} && rm dist/bundler/.gitignore
scripts.build:node: npx cross-env RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir dist/node --${PROFILE} && rm dist/node/.gitignore
scripts.build:web: npx cross-env RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="wasm_js"' wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/web --${PROFILE} && rm dist/web/.gitignore
